description: This file implements an internal lightweight router context for a React application, providing navigation methods (navigate, goBack) and managing route state with a React context.

methods.name: useRouter
methods.description: A custom hook to access the router context, throws an error if used outside the InternalRouter component.

methods.name: InternalRouter
methods.description: A React functional component that provides routing context to its children, managing a simple in-memory navigation stack.
